Package com.pgs.controller

Class ProveedorController

java.lang.Object
com.pgs.controller.ProveedorController
@CrossOrigin(origins="*", maxAge=3600L) @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1") public class ProveedorController extends Object
Controller for managing providers (suppliers). Provides endpoints to get, create, and update provider data.
Author:
Pablo Garcia Simavilla

  • Constructor Details

    • ProveedorController

      public ProveedorController()

  • Method Details

    • getAllProveedores

      @GetMapping("/proveedores") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAllProveedores()
      Retrieves all providers.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the list of all providers.

    • getProveedorById

      @GetMapping("/proveedores/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getProveedorById(@PathVariable(name="id") Long id)
      Retrieves a provider by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the provider to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the provider data if found, or an error message if not found.

    • postProveedor

      @PostMapping("/proveedores") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> postProveedor(@RequestBody ProveedorRequestDto dto)
      Creates a new provider.
      Parameters:
      dto - The provider data transfer object containing the provider's information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the result of the creation process (success or failure).

    • putProveedor

      @PutMapping("/proveedores/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> putProveedor(@PathVariable(name="id") Long id, @RequestBody ProveedorRequestDto dto)
      Updates an existing provider by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the provider to update.
      dto - The provider data transfer object containing the updated provider's information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity indicating the result of the update process (success or failure).
